short_summary: DND requires vessel rental equipment for training events
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) is requesting the rental of vessels for training events. The rental contract period will be June 4, 2024, to May 31, 2026. ",-",The goal of this contract is to accommodate vessels to be used in the DND.Training events will be generated by the DND.

full_summary:
================

### Government Tender Announcement

**Gov’t of Canada - RFP for Vessel Rental Services**

#### Reference Information
-----------------------------

| **English** | **French** | **Value** |
| :-------

| Request for Proposal (RFP) Title | Demande de Proposition (DP) : W6399-25FD04 | Vessel Rental |
| Solicitation Number | Numéro de sollicitation : WS4606254744 |  |
| Tender Closing Date | Date limite pour soumissionner : 2024-06-06T14:00:00 |  |
| Expected Contract Start Date | Date prévue pour le début du contrat : 2024-06-04 |  |
| Expected Contract End Date | Date prévue pour la fin du contrat : 2026-05-31 |  |

#### Tender Overview
-------------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting interested parties to submit a bid for the provision of vessel rental services and personnel for training events in Canada.

**Catégorie 4.1: Navires maritimes (cargos, navires marchands, yachts)**

The request for proposal is only open to Holders of Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415. Other interested bidders must first qualify for the supply arrangement before being given the opportunity to bid on this requirement.

To access the Request for Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415, click [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-kin-519-8707).

#### Important Information
-------------------------

* A Competitive – Selective Tendering procurement approach will be used.
* The procurement method is Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement.
* The services will be provided in Canada.
* The DND is the end-user entity of this procurement. 

#### Contact Information
----------------------

For more information or to submit a proposal, please contact Julie Simms at julie.simms@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or visit the link provided above.

#### Trade Agreements
-------------------

This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including:

*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Award Criteria
-------------------

 The contract
